[bq="SquiggyBomb"]So apparently [spoiler]Hentai Foundry is no longer allowing shota or loli content on it's site.[/spoiler]
Kind of a bummer...[/bq]
Oh yeah I heard, I don't care much for Loli but since 99% of Anime now a days _kind_ of consists of that they kind of just told thousands of Japanese artist on that site to get the fuck lost and told thousands of people not to draw anime related characters on a _Hentai website_.

"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53f2f4596368723748b60100#post_53f2f4596368723748b60100
You know the saying "The more beautiful and pure something is, the more satisfying it is to corrupt it?"
It's sort of like an inverse of that. The more frightening and horrifying something is, the more satisfying it is to make it cute.
